Package eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.block.file

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileLogger
    Save the data into a local file, appeding the received input at the end of the file with a timestamp.
    FTPCreateDir
    Create a remote directory.
    FTPList
    List the contents of the remote ftp directory when the trigger fires.
    FTPMoveFile
    Move/rename a remote file into.
    FTPMoveFiles
    Move/rename a set of files.
    FTPReceive
    Receive the contents of a remote file when the trigger fires.
    FTPReceiveAll
    Receive multiple files from the data source.
    FTPReplace
    Send and replace the given file to the ftp data source.
    FTPSend
    Send a file to the given ftp data source.
    FTPSendAll
    Send a set of files to the given ftp data source.
    FTPWatch
    Watch the given remote directory or file and trigger an event if something happens to it.
    LocalDirList
    List the contents of a local directory.
    LocalFileLoad
    Load the data from the local file.
    LocalFileLoadAll
    Load a set of local files.
    LocalFileMove
    Move/rename a local file.
    LocalFileMoveAll
    Move/rename a set of local files.
    LocalFileOutput
    Save the data into a local file, appending the received input at the end of file or overwriting the file.
    LocalFileSave
    Save the data into a local file.
    LocalFileSaveAll
    Save a set of files locally.
    LocalFileWatch
    Watch a local file or directory.
